This promotion is conducted exclusively by Hot Gift Zone and is subject to participation terms and conditions. Receipt of your item requires compliance with offer terms, including: age and residency requirements; registration with valid email address, shipping address and contact phone number; completion of user survey and sponsor promotions. Upon valid completion of all requirements, we will ship your item to your provided shipping address. Unless otherwise indicated, participation eligibility is restricted to U.S. residents, 18 and over. Void where prohibited. If you no longer wish to receive Hot Gift Zone emails, visit the unsubscribe page on the Hot Gift Zone site or visit the url: 
to unsubscribe, please update your status here.
             Or, print a copy of this   email and send it along with your request to: 
             Hot Gift Zone Gifts, 123 
               N. Congress Ave. #351, Boynton Beach, FL 33426.
